overview: Ben Nolan's 2021 experimental join of image and sound. A tour of industrial Northern England silhouetted by classical music to create a strange, uncomfortable mix of beauty in areas that have been abandoned, abused, mistreated and local councils yet lit alive by the people. "It's more a film to feel than to contemplate"  -Ben Nolan
tagline: The short film to accompany the novel of the same name: Teesside On Blue
title: Teesside On Blue
